tasks.task: Moving forward to start a farm task
subtasks: Standing up from a seated position

tasks.task: Getting into a position to start operating farm equipment
subtasks: Mounting the farm equipment such as a tractor
Adjusting the position on the equipment for operation
Steering the equipment to navigate the field
Adjusting speed as needed while driving

tasks.task: Performing agricultural tasks with the equipment
subtasks: Attaching a tool or attachment to the equipment
Operating the attached tool for plowing, cultivating, etc.
Applying agrichemicals or fertilizers from the equipment
Turning head to face the other person
